text: Unione Sportiva Dilettantistica Castelsardo is an Italian association football club located in Castelsardo, Sardinia. It currently plays in Serie D. Its colors are red and blue. ==Famous players== *Antonio Langella ==External links== *Official homepage *Castelsardo page at Serie-D.com Category:Football clubs in Italy Category:Football clubs in Sardinia Category:Association football clubs established in 1958 Category:1958 establishments in Italy
title: U.S.D. Castelsardo
